name: Andrzej Ito
profile_summary: As a Senior QA Engineer with over 9 years of experience, I possess a robust skill set in **automated testing**, **performance testing**, **load testing**, **debugging**, **data pipelines**, and **APIs**. I have a proven ability to develop and implement comprehensive testing strategies for **distributed systems** and maintain high standards of **data integrity** and **scalability**. My hands-on experience in **contract testing**, **integration testing**, and **system-level testing** equips me to ensure quality across software projects. Additionally, I am committed to enhancing user experience and driving innovation through my strong problem-solving capabilities, effective communication, and leadership in mentoring junior engineers.
